    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL u, ResourceBundle rb)
      Initilize method and fill out the combo boxes with the appropriate values. Prevent date picker from selecting past dates and weekends.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      u -
      rb - Lambda expression is used to prevent the user using the date picker to select past dates and weekends.
